verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

עֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Seh Make לְךָ֗ le-Cha, שְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> she-Tei thee two חֲצֽוֹצְרֹ֣ת <WH2689> cha-tzotz-Rot trumpets כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef, of silver מִקְשָׁ֖ה <WH4749> mik-Shah of a whole piece תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu them that thou mayest use לְךָ֙ le-Cha לְמִקְרָ֣א <WH4744> le-mik-Ra them for the calling הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, of the assembly וּלְמַסַּ֖ע <WH4550> u-le-mas-Sa' and for the journeying אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽמַּחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> Ham-ma-cha-Not. of the camps

וְתָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> ve-ta-ke-'U And when they shall blow בָּהֵ֑ן ba-Hen; וְנֽוֹעֲד֤וּ <WH3259> ve-no-'a-Du shall assemble אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, all the assembly אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach themselves to thee at the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if בְּאַחַ֖ת <WH259> be-'a-Chat [but] with one יִתְקָ֑עוּ <WH8628> yit-Ka-'u; And if they blow וְנוֹעֲד֤וּ <WH3259> ve-no-'a-Du shall gather אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֔ים <WH5387> han-ne-si-'Im, [trumpet] then the princes רָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> ra-Shei [which are] heads אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> 'al-Fei of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8628> u-te-ka'-Tem When ye blow תְּרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah; an alarm וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> ve-na-se-'U shall go forward הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Not, then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <WH2583> ha-cho-Nim that lie קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> Ke-de-mah. on the east parts

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH8628> u-te-ka'-Tem When ye blow תְּרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah an alarm שֵׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> she-Nit, the second time וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> ve-na-se-'U shall take their journey הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Not, then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <WH2583> ha-cho-Nim that lie תֵּימָ֑נָה <WH8486> tei-Ma-nah; on the south side תְּרוּעָ֥ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah an alarm יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> yit-ke-'U they shall blow לְמַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4550> le-mas-'ei-Hem. for their journeys

וּבְהַקְהִ֖יל <WH6950> u-ve-hak-Hil is to be gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקָּהָ֑ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal; But when the congregation תִּתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> tit-ke-'U ye shall blow וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo without תָרִֽיעוּ׃ <WH7321> ta-Ri-'u. but ye shall not sound an alarm

וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <WH8628> yit-ke-'U shall blow בַּֽחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <WH2689> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot; with the trumpets וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem לְחֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> le-chuk-Kat and they shall be to you for an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> le-do-ro-tei-Chem. throughout your generations

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- When תָבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> ta-Vo-'u And if ye go מִלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> mil-cha-Mah to war בְּאַרְצְכֶ֗ם <WH776> be-'ar-tze-Chem, in your land עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הַצַּר֙ <WH6862> hatz-Tzar against הַצֹּרֵ֣ר <WH6887> hatz-tzo-Rer the enemy that oppresseth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, וַהֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <WH7321> va-ha-re-'o-Tem you then ye shall blow an alarm בַּחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <WH2689> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot; with the trumpets וֲנִזְכַּרְתֶּ֗ם <WH2142> va-niz-kar-Tem, and ye shall be remembered לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God וְנוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3467> ve-no-sha'-Tem and ye shall be saved מֵאֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH341> me-'o-ye-vei-Chem. from your enemies

וּבְי֨וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom Also in the day שִׂמְחַתְכֶ֥ם <WH8057> sim-chat-Chem of your gladness וּֽבְמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֮ <WH4150> u-ve-mo-'a-dei-Chem and in your solemn days וּבְרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> u-ve-ra-Shei and in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶם֒ <WH2320> cha-de-shei-Chem of your months וּתְקַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8628> u-te-ka'-Tem ye shall blow בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֹ֗ת <WH2689> ba-cha-tzo-tze-Rot, with the trumpets עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al over עֹלֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5930> 'o-Lo-tei-Chem, over your burnt offerings וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and over זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> ziv-Chei and over the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <WH8002> shal-mei-Chem; of your peace offerings וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> le-zik-ka-rOn that they may be to you for a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God פ Peh

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַּשָּׁנָ֧ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֛ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit [day] of the second בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni in the second בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> be-'es-Rim And it came to pass on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh; of the month נַעֲלָה֙ <WH5927> na-'a-Lah was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan, that the cloud מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al over מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> mish-Kan from off the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut. of the testimony

וַיִּסְע֧וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U took בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> le-mas-'ei-Hem their journeys מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> mi-mid-Bar out of the wilderness סִינָ֑י <WH5514> si-Nai; of Sinai וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> vai-yish-Kon rested הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> he-'a-Nan and the cloud בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <WH6290> pa-Ran. of Paran

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U took their journey בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah; And they first עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. of Moses

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <WH5265> vai-yis-Sa' [place] went דֶּ֣גֶל <WH1714> De-gel the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> ba-ri-sho-Nah In the first לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> tze-va-'O, army נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <WH5177> nach-Shon and over his host [was] Nahshon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <WH5992> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> yi-so-sh-Char; of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <WH5417> ne-tan-'El [was] Nethaneel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צוּעָֽר׃ <WH6686> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av [was] Eliab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֵלֽוֹן׃ <WH2497> che-Lon. of Helon

וְהוּרַ֖ד <WH3381> ve-hu-Rad was taken down הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan; And the tabernacle וְנָסְע֤וּ <WH5265> ve-na-se-'U set forward בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- and the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <WH1648> ge-re-shOn of Gershon וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the sons מְרָרִ֔י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri, of Merari נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> no-se-'Ei bearing הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan. the tabernacle ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> ve-na-Sa', set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> De-gel And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- according צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> tze-va-'O, and over his host אֱלִיצ֖וּר <WH468> 'e-li-Tzur [was] Elizur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <WH7707> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on; of Simeon שְׁלֻֽמִיאֵ֖ל <WH8017> she-lu-mi-'El [was] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צוּרִֽי tzu-Ri שַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH6701> shad-Dai. of Zurishaddai

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- was over צְבָ֖א <WH6635> tze-Va And over the host מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children גָ֑ד <WH1410> Gad; of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> 'el-ya-Saf [was] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <WH1845> de-'u-'El. of Deuel

וְנָסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> ve-na-se-'U set forward הַקְּהָתִ֔ים <WH6956> hak-ke-ha-Tim, And the Kohathites נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> no-se-'Ei bearing הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> ham-mik-Dash; the sanctuary וְהֵקִ֥ימוּ <WH6965> ve-he-Ki-mu and [the other] did set up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- before בֹּאָֽם׃ <WH935> bo-'Am. against they came ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> ve-na-Sa', set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <WH1714> De-gel And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> tze-va-'O, and over his host אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <WH476> 'e-li-sha-Ma' [was] Elishama בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <WH1583> gam-li-'El [was] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פְּדָה־ <WH6301> pe-dah- of Pedahzur צֽוּר׃ <WH6301> tzur of Pedahzur

וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> ve-'Al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <WH27> 'a-vi-Dan [was] Abidan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גִּדְעוֹנִֽי׃ <WH1441> gid-'o-Ni. of Gideoni ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֗ע <WH5265> ve-na-Sa', set forward דֶּ֚גֶל <WH1714> De-gel And the standard מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of the camp בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> Dan, of Dan מְאַסֵּ֥ף <WH622> me-'as-Sef [which was] the rereward לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֖ת <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Not of all the camps לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <WH6635> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their hosts וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> tze-va-'O, and over his host אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH295> 'a-chi-'E-zer [was] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַמִּישַׁדָּֽי׃ <WH5996> 'am-mi-shad-Dai of Ammishaddai

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- over צְבָ֔א <WH6635> tze-Va, And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> 'a-Sher; of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH6295> pag-'i-'El [was] Pagiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <WH5918> 'a-che-Ran. of Ocran
